description: Updates the behavior configuration of Route 53 Resolver behavior for a single VPC from Amazon Virtual Private Cloud.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon Virtual Private Cloud VPC or a Route 53 Profile that you're configuring Resolver for.

parameters.name: AutodefinedReverseFlag
parameters.description: Indicates whether or not the Resolver will create autodefined rules for reverse DNS lookups. This is enabled by default. Disabling this option will also affect EC2-Classic instances using ClassicLink. For more information, see ClassicLink in the Amazon EC2 guide.

nested_items.name: ResolverConfig
nested_items.description: An array that contains settings for the specified Resolver configuration.

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Virtual Private Cloud VPC or a Route 53 Profile that you're configuring Resolver for.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The owner account ID of the Amazon Virtual Private Cloud VPC.

nested_items.name: AutodefinedReverse
nested_items.description: The status of whether or not the Resolver will create autodefined rules for reverse DNS lookups. This is enabled by default. The status can be one of following:
